WorkItem.ClosedComment: 1. No longer exists, 2. was reported in another issueThis issue has been open for 60+ days without response. If this is still an issue, please resubmit with current files and references to the versions affected.
WorkItem.Description:
First of all thank you for fixing the supression issue so that hit is calculated correctly. I do see quite a bit of progress with the haste issues as well as gear choices Rawr is picking are more logical based on scaling, etc.
 
Couple of things I noticed...
 
1. There are 2 fields to pick glyphs... one of which does NOT effect dps (under options, glyphs). The other one does effect dps (talents, glyphs). This is a little confusing.
 
2. The glyph of incinerate, immolate, and life tap all seem to give a boost in dps. Conflagrate actually causes DPS to go DOWN, which doesn't make sense. Chaos Bolt does nothing (again, should give a boost). Imp does nothing either (shout boost dps with imp pet).
 
Otherwise thanks for the work and I look forward to more improvments.

Comments.Message: Again, issue #13267 is the conflagrate glyph bug. Glyph of Chaos Bolt isn't implemented yet. Glyph of Imp is still to be transferred over from the old glyph system to the new one as far as I can see.
